```{r}

install.packages("readr")
install.packages("tidyverse")
library(readr)
library(tidyverse)

data <- read_csv("EdStats_v01.csv")

data_clean <- data %>%
  filter(grepl("USA", `Country code`)) %>%
  slice(-(14:165))

write_csv(data_clean, "EdStats_USA.csv")

```
